title: Arabic 26
text: How couldst thou forget thine own faults and busy thyself with the faults of others? Whoso doeth this is accursed of Me.

prev.title: Arabic 25
prev.text: Vaunt not thyself over the poor, for I lead him on his way and behold thee in thy evil plight and confound thee forevermore.
prev.teaser: Vaunt not thyself over the poor...

next.title: Arabic 27
next.text: Breathe not the sins of others so long as thou art thyself a sinner. Shouldst thou transgress this command, accursed wouldst thou be, and to this I bear witness.
